Reviews.Title: Great camera, great value
Reviews.Author: Sky Greene "Sky"
Reviews.Content: This Vivitar Camera is not only easy to use and easy to handle, as its light weight and fits nicely in your hand, but picture taking is truly up to par with much more expensive cameras.  Whether you zoom in or out, or whatever the setting you find yourself in, you can count on this camera to take vivid, quality pics.  I highly recommend it.

Reviews.Title: Great Deal
Reviews.Author: admiretechnolgies
Reviews.Content: The camera is a great value. Not a lot of features but great for decent resolution pictures and doesn't eat up the memory in the SD card.

Reviews.Title: Worthless Junk **** DO NOT BUY***
Reviews.Author: Anthony D. Delmar "Satrn8"
Reviews.Content: The Vivitar 8018 takes horrible pictures because most of the pictures were blurry and there was very faint color. The "color" pictures were  in Black in white and they came out too bright even though I lowered the Brightness settings. My 2 MP Camera on my phone takes better pictures than this. It uses 3 AAA batteries which the camera has a very short battery life. I used the camera for about two hours and the next day it was dead.  The camera says it Zoom at 8X but it doesn't have an actual one. Bottom line: Save your Money and Don't buy this Camera!

Reviews.Title: Did not like
Reviews.Author: Arthur Lozano
Reviews.Content: Don't know if its me or the camera.  I was not able to work the flash correctly.  Many of the pictures were burry after taking them.  I just did not like the camera at all.  I still have it but don't use it.

Reviews.Title: Hey Guess What?!?!
Reviews.Author: Kali Zyre "kalizyre"
Reviews.Content: The camera doesn't come with a memory card!!!  So you can't use it right out of the package.  I've always really liked Vivitar cameras, but we're off to a rough start with this one.

Reviews.Title: VERY poor performance
Reviews.Author: camjunky
Reviews.Content: Not even 10 months old. Paid WAY too much from CVS (80.00) in Denver b/c I forgot to pack my camera.This piece of junk does not zoom at all. EVERYTHING is fuzzy, all pics. Terrible colors, terrible pics, would NEVER buy vivtar again.very dissatisfied

Reviews.Title: Great Simple Camera
Reviews.Author: Miltrane "M B"
Reviews.Content: I like to take pictures but am not technically savy.  The camera takes great pictures even when zooming in.  The phone is slim and can fit in your pocket. While I was originally nervous, this is a great camera

ProductInfo.Features:
Sd Card Support Up To 8 Gb (Sd Card Not Included)
Movie Mode; Face And Smile Detection; Red Eye Reduction
ProductInfo.Name: Vivitar V8018 Digital Camera
